Create a toothbrush that can be used to clean multiple surfaces, such as teeth, countertops, and even shoes.
Design a toothbrush that vibrates at different frequencies to promote gum health and prevent cavities.
Integrate a smart sensor into a toothbrush that can track brushing habits and provide personalized feedback on technique and duration.
Create a toothbrush that uses artificial intelligence to learn from user behavior and adjust its bristle patterns accordingly.
Develop a toothbrush that uses biodegradable materials and packaging to reduce waste and environmental impact.
